titleStmt.title: SII 14.220: original edition by A. S. Ramanatha Ayyar
No. 220. (A.R. No. 326 of 1916.) TIRUVĀLĪŚVARAM, AMBASAMUDRAM TALUK, TIRUNELVELI DISTRICT. ON THE SOUTH WALL OF THE VĀLĪŚVARA TEMPLE.

summary.p: This mutilated epigraph belongs to the same king and contains the regnal year 9. It mentions a previous donation of Sundara-Pāṇḍyadēva, and registers a grant of 2 mākkāṇi of land for providing sandal paste and camphor to god Tiruvālīśvaram-Uḍaiyār. A merchant of Rājarāja-Eṟivīrapaṭṭaṇam is also referred to as agreeing to supply these articles to the temple.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
kam muḷutumuṭaiyā
(r)roṭu viṟṟiruntaruḷi
ya māmutalmatikakulam viḷakkiya
koccaṭaipaṉ
marāṉa tribhuvanaścakravattikaḷ śrī
vallapadevarkku yāṇṭu 9
āvatu muḷḷināṭṭut tiru
vālicciramuṭaiya mahāde
varkku tirumeyppūccu cā
tti Aruḷa muṉpu cantaṉa
p lai koṇṭāṉ
ciricuntarapāṇṭiya tevar
pirasātañ ceytaruḷiṉa ti
rumukappaṭi nāḷ Oṉṟukkut ti
rumeyppūccukku cikaṇṭa
ñ cantaṉa mukkaḻañcākavum
pac m ce
luttuvaṉāka Ivvūr rājarā
ja Eṟivirapaṭṭaṇat tirukku
m viyāpāri kaṇṇaṅkuṭai
yāṉa Āṉa tiruvekampamuṭai
yāṉ Ivaṉ vaṟkattāru
m celuttukaikku Ittevar te
vatāṉam civacaraṇacekaranallūrile cantaṉa kaṟpūrattuk
ku viruttiyāka Iraṇṭu mākkāṇi nilam Iṭṭukkuṭukka
veṉṟu Ikkuyil tevkanmikaḷukkum śrīmahāyeśurakka
ṇkāṇi ceyvārkaḷukkum Ikkoyiṟ piṭitta Avaṉi
yventan vār cuntarapāṇṭiyatevar tirumukam
piracātañ ceytaruḷi vantamaiyil Ikkoyil tevarkanmi
kaḷ kaliyāṇacuntarapaṭṭaṉum puralivaripaṭṭaṉum
kulapaṭṭaṉum Aññūṟṟuvapaṭṭaṉum palmahāyeśvarapaṭṭaṉum nālāyi
ra paṭṭaṉum Ikkoyil māṭāpattiyam Āṭkoṇṭa nāyakap piccaṉāṉa Aṇ
ṭa nāṭṭu kannāṉum caiyvacikāmaṇipiccaṉum Avaṉiyarāyar kaṇkāṇi tirucci
ṟṟampalamuventaveḷāna kaṇkāṇiyāka Iṭṭa kār maṟuviḷaiThe continuation is damaged.
